data.name: Cosmotica
data.detailed_description:
Cosmotica is a tough-as-nails first-person platforming game that tests your platforming prowess in the void of deep space. Jump, walljump, and dash through 30 hand-crafted levels. Master the high skill movement that makes for fun speedruns through the levels. Cosmotica's movement, visuals, and soundtrack create a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy.

Experience Marbie Games' debut title. We are a team of 5 childhood friends who started making games for fun and are very happy to put out our first finished title here on steam. Please feel free to contact us to tell us about your experience with the game or express and feedback!

data.short_description: Cosmotica is a tough-as-nails first-person platforming game that tests your platforming prowess in the void of deep space. Jump, walljump, and dash through 30 hand-crafted levels. Master the high skill movement that makes for fun speedruns through the levels.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 Super
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
